add_library(mirsharedenv OBJECT
  default_configuration.cpp
)

list(APPEND MIR_COMMON_SOURCES
  $<TARGET_OBJECTS:mirsharedenv>
)

set(MIR_COMMON_SOURCES ${MIR_COMMON_SOURCES} PARENT_SCOPE)
